ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful for financial support from the Swiss Programme for Research on Global Issues for Development (r4d), funded by the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNSF) and the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC), for the project “Woody invasive alien species in East Africa: Assessing and mitigating their negative impact on ecosystem services and rural livelihood” (Grant Number: 400440_152085). Urs Schaffner was supported by CABI with core financial support from its member countries (see http://www.cabi.org/about-cabi/who-we-work-with/key-donors/). We thank the staff of Addis Ababa University’s Water and Land Resource Center for their support and facilitation services and we also thank three anonymous reviewers of the earlier draft of the manuscript. Last but not least, we thank the late Rahel Eshetu for her dedication and support on setting up EC instrument in the field and sharing information related to EC.
